item.title: GitHub Actions FTW
item.description: Using GitHub Actions with Hugo to build this site Making use of GitHub actions in combination with Hugo is a nice and easy way to build static web pages. The following resources helped to make this really easy: GH actions by peaceiris Hermit Template Nice blog as baseline
